title: Navigation Menu Open and Close Functionality
description: Verify that the slide-out navigation menu opens and closes correctly upon user interaction.

steps.description: Load the application home page
Click on the menu icon to open the navigation menu
Check that the navigation menu is visible and slide-out animation completes
Click on the close icon inside navigation menu
Check that the navigation menu is hidden and slide-in animation completes

title: Category Expansion and Collapse in Navigation Menu
description: Verify that expandable categories (Jewelry, Accessories, Collections) in the slide-out menu expand and collapse correctly with smooth transitions.

steps.description: Open the navigation menu
Click on the 'Jewelry' category to expand
Verify subcategories or items under 'Jewelry' are displayed
Click on the 'Jewelry' category to collapse
Verify subcategories or items under 'Jewelry' are hidden
Repeat expand/collapse steps for 'Accessories' and 'Collections' categories

title: Home Page Artistic Elements Rendering
description: Verify the home landing page renders the grain overlay and abstract gradient effects consistent with the design specification.

steps.description: Navigate to the home page
Verify grain overlay effect is visible
Verify abstract gradient backgrounds are rendered as specified

title: User Login and Account Access with State Persistence
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully, access the account page, and that login state persists across page reloads.

steps.description: Navigate to login view via user icon or direct path
Enter valid user credentials and submit the login form
Verify user is logged in and redirected to account view
Refresh the page
Verify user remains logged in with account details visible
Log out and verify user is redirected or logged out state is shown

title: Product Collection Filtering by Category
description: Verify product collection view supports filtering products correctly based on selected category.

steps.description: Navigate to the collection view
Apply filter for 'Jewelry' category
Verify only products belonging to 'Jewelry' category are displayed
Change filter to 'Accessories' category
Verify only products belonging to 'Accessories' category are displayed
Clear filters
Verify all products are displayed without filtering

title: Product Detail Display Accuracy
description: Verify product detail page displays accurate and complete product information including images, name, price, and description.

steps.description: Select a product from the collection view to open detail page
Check product images are rendered and can be viewed
Validate product name and price are displayed correctly
Verify product description and additional details are present

title: Add to Cart Functionality and Cart Item Count Update
description: Verify adding a product from the product detail page updates the shopping cart item count correctly and reflects accurate items in the cart.

steps.description: Open a product detail page
Click 'Add to Cart' button
Check the cart icon updates with correct item count increment
Navigate to the shopping cart page
Verify that the added product is listed with correct quantity and price

title: Shopping Cart Checkout Flow
description: Validate the checkout flow starts from the cart with correct item review capability and proceeds towards checkout.

steps.description: Add one or more items to the shopping cart
Open the shopping cart page
Review all items, quantities, and prices for accuracy
Click the 'Checkout' button
Verify the checkout process initiates and user is taken to appropriate checkout page or flow

title: Responsive Design Verification
description: Verify that the application UI adapts correctly to desktop (1440px), tablet (768px), and mobile (375px) screen sizes including menus, product displays, and forms.

steps.description: Load the application at 1440px viewport width
Verify that all components including navigation menu, home page, collections, product details, cart, and account are displayed correctly and usable
Resize viewport to 768px (tablet)
Verify all views respond appropriately, the menu is accessible, and content is readable and properly formatted
Resize viewport to 375px (mobile)
Verify the mobile layout with slide-out menu, product listings, and cart functions correctly and all UI elements remain usable

title: Design Tokens and Visual Effects Consistency
description: Verify the usage of design tokens including color palettes, typography, and visual effects like grain overlay is consistent across all pages and components.

steps.description: Browse through Home, Collection, Product Detail, Cart, and Account views
Check colors, fonts, and visual effects match design tokens and project theme
Verify no inconsistent styling or deviations from the design system

title: Invalid Login Credentials Handling
description: Verify login view handles invalid user credentials gracefully by showing appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to login view
Enter invalid username/email and password
Submit the login form
Check error message indicating invalid credentials is displayed and login is unsuccessful

title: Add to Cart When No Product Selected
description: Verify that trying to add to cart without selecting required options (if any) shows an error or prevents the action.

steps.description: Navigate to product detail page with options (e.g. size, color)
Attempt to click 'Add to Cart' without selecting required product options
Check that appropriate validation message is shown and product is not added to cart

title: Empty Shopping Cart Behavior
description: Verify the behavior and UI when opening the shopping cart with no items added.

steps.description: Ensure shopping cart is empty
Navigate to the shopping cart page
Verify message or UI elements indicate empty cart state
Checkout button should be disabled or not accessible

title: Navigation Between Views
description: Verify navigation between main app views (Home, Account, Collection, Product Detail, Cart) is functional and state is preserved as per design.

steps.description: Navigate to Home view
Use navigation menu to open Collection view
Collection view should load with correct content
Select a product to open Product Detail view
Product detail page displays correct product
Navigate to Cart view
Cart page is displayed with current items
Navigate to Account view
Account page is displayed with user info or login option

title: Responsive Header States (Light and Dark View Modes)
description: Verify header components adapt correctly to light and dark states across different viewport sizes.

steps.description: Switch to light mode (if supported)
Verify header UI elements render correctly with light theme colors and styles
Switch to dark mode (if supported)
Verify header UI elements render correctly with dark theme colors and styles
Resize viewport to tablet and mobile sizes
Verify header remains visible, legible and functional in all modes and sizes
